name: Silence (itch)
description:
You got abducted.
Only this strange alien may help you escape, and all you count in is your hearing and your mental focus. Your choices may help you understand what you are in for, and maybe, just maybe, survive.

Silence is a strange and addictive game, with an unique sound-based gameplay.

We're currently on Steam Greenlight too, please consider giving us a hand!
